      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.String choice,
                       java.lang.Integer diff)
        Method used for initializing game(It is necessary to do it before playing new game)
        Parameters:
        choice - Players choice of character("X"/"O")
        diff - Difficulty level(1/2/3)

      • isHuman

        public boolean isHuman(java.lang.String character)
        Examines if character in parameter is used by human or computer
        Parameters:
        character - Holds value of character we want to test
        Returns:
        True if human player is using character from parameter or false otherwise

        Method which determines if next turn should be played by human or computer player

      • checkScore

        public int checkScore()
        Method which checks score
        Returns:
        0 if score isn't determined yet, 1 if "X" won, 2 if "O" won and 3 if it's a draw

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.Integer position,

        Method used for placing character on board
        Parameters:
        position - Position where we will be placing character
        character - Character we want to place on board

      • getComputerMove

        public int getComputerMove()
        Method used for getting computers move.
        Returns:
        Position where we will be placing computers character

      • getComputerMoveAlt

        public int getComputerMoveAlt()
        Alternative to getComputerMove()(Use is same as getComputerMove() but it is done randomly in every case)
        Returns:
        Position where we will be placing computers character
